welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kanding, Taiwan! Prepare to be enchanted by our breathtaking natural scenery and vibrant culture. We invite you to immerse yourself in our city's charm and discover all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Kaoshiung International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal that primarily serves international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'KIA_Free_WiFi' and completing a short registration process.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pingtung Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pingtung Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
